Html:
Hello,

When I try to build my page I ma getting the following error:

"Could not load file or assembly 'DocumentFormat.OpenXml, Version=2.0.3302.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35' or one of its dependencies. The system cannot find the file specified. "

I noticed the version of  SDK 2.0 that I installed from the link on Simple OOXML homepage is v 2.0.3930.0

How do we get the older version?

Thanks,

Burak
The latest release of Simple OOXML fixes this problem so that you can work against the April 2009 release of the SDK.

I have the same problem but i have the 2.4330.0 version installed and it complains about not having the 2.0.3930.0 version. How can i get it to work?

I guess it should ask for a version range, not a specific build.
well, answering to my own question, i "fixed" it by downloading your source code and compiling the library with the sdk build i have installed.
The latest build available form the downloads tab uses the August 2009 CTP.
